html:
{%- macro add_header(page_num, max_pages, doc, letter_head, no_letterhead) -%} {%- if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%}
{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif -%} {%- endmacro -%} {{ add_header(0,1,doc,letter_head, no_letterhead) }}
{{doc.branch}}
RUNNING ACCOUNT BILL
{%- if doc.docstatus == 2 -%} Cancelled {%- endif -%}
Project Name: {{doc.project}} Invoice #: {{ doc.name }}
Work Order Issued : {{ frappe.db.get_value("Project",doc.project, "referenceno") }} Invoice Date: {{frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.invoice_date)}}
Customer: {{ doc.customer }} Status: {%- if doc.docstatus == 0 -%} Draft {%- endif -%} {%- if doc.docstatus == 1 -%} Submitted {%- endif -%}
Inauguration: {{ frappe.db.get_value("Project",doc.project, "expected_start_date")}}
Completion Date: {{ frappe.db.get_value("Project",doc.project, "expected_end_date") }}
Contract Price: {{ frappe.format_value(frappe.db.get_value("Project",doc.project, "project_value"), {"fieldtype": "Currency"})}}
Advance Payment:
{%- for row in doc.project_invoice_boq -%} {%- if row.is_selected -%} {%- if row.original_quantity -%} {%- else -%} {%- endif -%} {%- else -%} {%- endif -%} {%- endfor -%}
Sr Description of item. Unit BOQ Quantity Amount(Nu)
Rate Qty Since previous Up to Date Since previous Up to Date
{{ row.idx }} {{ row.item }} {{ row.uom }} {{ frappe.format_value(row.invoice_rate, {"fieldtype":"Currency"}) }} {{ row.original_quantity }} {{ row.invoice_quantity }} {{ row.uptodate_quantity+row.invoice_quantity }} {{ frappe.format_value(row.invoice_amount | round (2), {"fieldtype":"Currency"}) }} {{ frappe.format_value(row.uptodate_amount+row.invoice_amount | round (2), {"fieldtype":"Currency"}) }} {{ row.idx }} {{ row.item }}
{{ row.idx }} {{ row.item }} {{ row.uom }} {{ frappe.format_value(row.invoice_rate, {"fieldtype":"Currency"}) }} {{row.original_quantity}} -- -- -- --
Total: {{ frappe.format_value((doc.gross_invoice_amount), {"fieldtype":"Currency"})}}
Add For Price Adjustment: {{ frappe.format_value((doc.price_adjustment_amount), {"fieldtype":"Currency"})}}
Total including Price Adjustment: {{ frappe.format_value((doc.net_invoice_amount), {"fieldtype":"Currency"})}}
Advance Recovery: {{ frappe.format_value((0), {"fieldtype":"Currency"})}}
TDS : {{ frappe.format_value((doc.tds_amount), {"fieldtype":"Currency"})}}
Net Payable: {{ frappe.format_value((doc.net_invoice_amount), {"fieldtype":"Currency"})}}
Project Engineer.
This print is system generated and should be considered VALID only with appropriate seal and/or signature.
Printed by {{ frappe.user }} on {{ frappe.utils.nowdate() }} at {{ frappe.utils.nowtime() }}
name: Project Running Bill
